alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Tampa to near Seminole. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Temple Terrace, Seminole, New Port Richey, Lutz, Holiday, St. Petersburg, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, New Port Richey East, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Land O Lakes, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, University and West And East Lealman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
